zoom (bool) – Whether the image should be zoomed.

Update the displayed image according to the current zoom factor.

class preview_widget.PreviewWidget(main, name, settings, preview_mode, on_save, button_flags)[source]

Bases: TabPage

A widget for creating and displaying images using Make

This widget has two modes: - Preview Mode: Generates small images for quick viewing. - Full Build Mode: Produces full-sized images with features for publishing, cleaning temporary files, and

launching an external viewer.

preview_mode

Determines the operational mode (Preview or Full Build).

Type:

bool

image_label

Displays the generated image in preview mode.

Type:

QLabel

zoom_factor

The current zoom level for the image display.

Type:

float

make_handler

Manages the make process for image generation and maintenance.

Type:

MakeHandler

cancel_for_out_of_date(action, target)[source]

Displays a confirmation dialog if the project is out of date.

Parameters:

  • action (str) – The name of the action (e.g., ‘Publish’, ‘View’) to display in the dialog.

  • target (str) – The name of the target

Returns:

True if out of date, and they cancel, False to proceed,

Return type:

bool

init_ui()[source]

Initialize UI components for the display

launch_application(app, image_path)[source]

Launch an application to open the given image file.

Parameters:

  • app (str) – The application to use (‘default’ for system viewer).

  • image_path (str) – Path to the image file.

Returns:

The name of the application chosen to launch.

Return type:

str

Raises:

  • ValueError – If the operating system is unsupported or an invalid app is specified.

  • FileNotFoundError – If the specified application is not found.

  • RuntimeError – If the application fails to launch the file or the window cannot be

  • activated. –
